post.file: setenv BLATHOME /opt/biotools/blat set path = ( $BLATHOME/bin/x86_64 $path ) setenv BOWTIEHOME /opt/biotools/bowtie set path = ( $BOWTIEHOME/bin $BOWTIEHOME/scripts $path ) setenv BWAHOME /opt/biotools/bwa set path = ( $BWAHOME/bin $path ) setenv GATKHOME /opt/biotools/GenomeAnalysisTK if ($?CLASSPATH) then setenv CLASSPATH "${GATKHOME}:$CLASSPATH" else setenv CLASSPATH $GATKHOME endif set path = ( $BWAHOME/bin $path ) setenv SAMTOOLSHOME /opt/biotools/samtools set path = ( /opt/biotools/velvet/bin $path ) set path = ( /opt/biotools/soapdenovo/bin $path ) set path = ( $SAMTOOLSHOME/bin $path )

export BLATHOME=/opt/biotools/blat export PATH=$BLATHOME/bin/x86_64:$PATH export BOWTIEHOME=/opt/biotools/bowtie export PATH=$BOWTIMEHOME/bin:$BOWTIEHOME/scripts:$PATH export BWAHOME=/opt/biotools/bwa export PATH=$BWAHOME/bin:$PATH export GATKHOME=/opt/biotools/GenomeAnalysisTK if test -n "$CLASSPATH"; then export CLASSPATH="${GATKHOME}:$CLASSPATH" else export CLASSPATH=$GATKHOME fi export SAMTOOLSHOME=/opt/biotools/samtools export PATH=$SAMTOOLSHOME/bin:$PATH export PATH=/opt/biotools/velvet/bin:$PATH export PATH=/opt/biotools/soapdenovo/bin:$PATH
